channel.title: URL on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in URL on Blog

item.title: Connecting to the internet with Java
item.description: Connecting to the internet with Java Hello and welcome to my first Java tutorial. This is going to be my only text-based Java tutorial, the others will be videos. In this tutorial we’re going to go over how to make a URL request in Java. First we’re going to make a class named FrameLayoutURLReader, this class will extend JFrame and implement ActionListener. By inheriting from JFrame, we make this program an application whose layout will be swing/ frame based.
